  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(ServerSocket listenSocket, Controller controller, Registry registry)
      Constructs a Server object with the specified listen socket, controller, and registry.
      Parameters:
      listenSocket - the ServerSocket object that the server will use to listen for incoming connections
      controller - the Controller object that will handle the business logic for the server
      registry - the Registry object used for service registration

    • startServer

      public static void startServer(String host, int socketport, int rmiport) throws IOException
      Starts the server with the specified host, socket port, and RMI port.
      Parameters:
      host - the hostname or IP address of the server
      socketport - the port number for the server socket
      rmiport - the port number for the RMI registry
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the socket or registry
